meanings.sent1: I can contradistinguish the two types of birds by their colors.
meanings.sent2: She contradistinguished the flavors of the two different ice creams.
meanings.sent3: Trying to contradistinguish identical twins can be quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness contradistinguished her from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The bright red apple contradistinguished itself among the green ones.

meanings.definition: To set in opposition or contrast.
meanings.sent1: The artist contradistinguished light and dark in his painting.
meanings.sent2: The politician contradistinguished his views from his opponent's.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog contradistinguished each other in their behavior.
meanings.sent4: His actions contradistinguished his words, causing confusion.
meanings.sent5: The black and white stripes on the zebra contradistinguish it from other animals.
